survey_name: Employee Satisfaction with Workplace Ergonomics Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to assess employee satisfaction with the ergonomic setup and comfort of their workstations to identify areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the ergonomic setup of your current workspace?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure satisfaction levels. Ensure the question is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the ergonomic setup of your current workspace?

questions.question_text: Which of the following ergonomic issues have you experienced in the past 6 months? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multiple-choice question to identify common ergonomic problems. Ensure options are clear and inclusive.

script.question_text: Which of the following ergonomic issues have you experienced in the past 6 months? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest to enhance the ergonomics of your workspace?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback. Encourage detailed responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest to enhance the ergonomics of your workspace?

questions.question_text: Have you received any ergonomic training or resources from your employer in the past year?
questions.client_notes: Single-choice question to assess awareness of ergonomic resources. Keep options simple.

script.question_text: Have you received any ergonomic training or resources from your employer in the past year?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your current workspace ergonomics to a colleague?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure likelihood. This question helps gauge overall satisfaction.
